thread.title: Ivo hafid Flores
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Ivo hafid Flores

author: Ivo hafid Flores
title: Ivo hafid Flores
text: I almost tried to use another flower delivery services and i remembered since 2013 i have always been using Euroflorist and i have never encountered any problems. So, i didnt care if the price is a little higher than the others as long as the service is excellent and the payment through credit card is secure i will always stay with Euroflorist. Keep up the good work guys! Till next time. üëçüëçüëç
